[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview-decoder](./harp-mapview-decoder.md) &gt; [DataProvider](./harp-mapview-decoder.dataprovider.md)

## DataProvider interface

Interface for all `DataProvider` subclasses. The `DataProvider` is an abstraction of the tile loader which is only responsible for loading the binary data of a specific tile, without any relation to displaying or even decoding the data.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DataProvider 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [connect()](./harp-mapview-decoder.dataprovider.connect.md) | Connect to the data source. Returns a promise to wait for successful (or failed) connection. |
|  [getTile(tileKey, abortSignal)](./harp-mapview-decoder.dataprovider.gettile.md) | Load the data of a \[\[Tile\]\] asynchronously in form of an \[\[ArrayBufferLike\]\]. |
|  [ready()](./harp-mapview-decoder.dataprovider.ready.md) | Returns <code>true</code> if it has been connected successfully. |
